archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create the technical manuals
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The technical documentation is updated twice a year, by batch. Once produced, the technical documentation is published via Orion and customers access the documentation using the KeyCopters portal. Two different level or type of update: - Safety: deliver via a SB and then integrated into the documentation - ILS update The production of the documentation is sub-contracted based on a catalogue of service : - ~1500 € to update an IPC figure - ~3000 € to create an IPC figure
